Ext.form.field.Date Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.1.0 Ext.form.field.Date
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.create('Ext.form.Panel', {
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
        width: 300,
        bodyPadding: 10,
        title: 'Dates',
        items: [{
            xtype: 'datefield',
            anchor: '100%',
            fieldLabel: 'From',
            name: 'from_date',
            maxValue: new Date() // limited to the current date or prior
        }, {
            xtype: 'datefield',
            anchor: '100%',
            fieldLabel: 'To',
            name: 'to_date',
            value: new Date() // defaults to today
        }]
    });
});
